SELECT company_infos_id, company_name, position.id as position_id, position_no, position_name, delivery.deal_status AS deal_status, delivery.server_create_date AS server_create_date FROM job_seeker_resume_delivery delivery JOIN company_position_infos position ON delivery.job_code = position.position_no JOIN company_infos company ON position.company_infos_id = company.id JOIN job_seeker_infos jobSeeker ON delivery.job_seeker_infos_id=jobSeeker.id
AND jobSeeker.id= #{params.jobSeekerInfosId}
AND company.company_name = like CONCAT('%',#{params.companyName},'%')
AND delivery.deal_status = #{params.postionStatus}
AND position.position_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.positionName},'%')
AND position.position_no like CONCAT('%',#{params.positionNo},'%')
AND delivery.server_create_date BETWEEN timestamp(DATE (#{params.serverCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})) AND timestamp(DATE (#{params.serverCreateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),'23:59:59')
